message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $11500. This is a great price considering the value it brings to your business.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10000 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. This is the lowest price I can offer, considering the product's value to your business.
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10500.

I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your proposal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10750. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and my costs.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Based on my budget constraints and the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $10600.

I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your proposal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and my costs.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $10400 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10300. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and my costs.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Based on my budget and the value of the product, I would like to propose a final price of $10200.
